original_title: Celebrity Manhunt's Total Drama Action Reunion Special
overview: All twenty-two Total Drama contestants gather to collect a Gemmie Award for their show. However, their wonderful world comes crashing down when a new reality show is announced to replace them. In a desperate attempt to save their fame, all of the contestants (plus a new face) join together in a race to New York City in a bus to beat out a team of dirtbags and their leader.
title: Celebrity Manhunt's Total Drama Action Reunion Special
